Subject: GAOKAO English - Exam Answer Key

Background: 
The GAOKAO (National Higher Education Entrance Examination) in China is a critical standardized test that assesses students' readiness for university admission. In the English section of the exam, students are required to read passages and answer questions based on them. As an instructor, your task is to provide the answer key for the exam questions.
